name: BbotBartender
0:
”Alexa, ask bee bot to bring me a beer”
”Alexa, ask bee bot for another round”
”Alexa, ask bee bot to bring me 1 guinness at table fox”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bee bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is for bar and nightclub owners who have purchased the Bbot system. Bbot is a robotic drink delivery system for bars and nightclubs that is used to increase the speed of service and revenue for owners.

For more information about Bbot please see https://bbot.menu/faq
